#!/usr/bin/python2.3
# Convert all the selected words to Titlecase except those in the dont_cap array. # Warning: This script normalizes all the words to have a single space between them and removes any newlines....
import sys
dont_cap = ["of","a","the","and","an","or","nor","but","if","then","else","when","up","at","from","by","on","off","for","in","out","over","to"] lines = sys.stdin.read() words = lines.split() for i in range(len(words)): if words[i] not in dont_cap: words[i] = words[i].capitalize() sys.stdout.write(' '.join(words))
